S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4154 DboPowersTest should not hard upgrade the system/wombat database
The patch makes the hard upgrade fixture use another database than "system/wombat", by wrapping the offending test cases in a singleUseDatabaseDecorator.
Merged from trunk as: svn merge -c 788369 https://svn.eu.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/code/trunk
